# Distance (MagWpnSpcAb)
## Overview
This special ability can only be placed on a ranged weapon. A *distance* weapon has double the range increment of other weapons of its kind.

Moderate divination; CL 6th; [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], *[[Clairaudience_Clairvoyance (Spell)|clairaudience/clairvoyance]]*; Price +1 bonus.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 470
